entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:10 PM PDT Saturday 11 March 2023
